notes.note:
Firefox now prevents websites from automatically playing sound. You can [add individual sites to an exceptions list or turn blocking off][1]. To learn more about block autoplay, which will be rolled out gradually to all users, visit the [Mozilla blog][2].


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/block-autoplay
  [2]: https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2019/03/19/todays-firefox-aims-to-reduce-your-online-annoyances/#block-autoplay
Smoother scrolling: Scroll anchoring keeps content from jumping as images and ads load at the top of the page
Added support to open files from external storage, such as an SD card

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2019/03/11/firefox-66-new-contributors/
title: Firefox for Android 66.0 Release
